entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:28 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -24.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
